I use my own implementation of NEAT integrated the Open Beagle
framework. I=
 don't use the stolen babies mechanism. 

   * population size : 500
   * e=
litism per species : 2
   * crossover probability : 0.1
   * edge mutation =
probability : 0.8
   * add-edge probability : 0.05
   * add-edge probabilit=
y : 0.04
   * unactivated edge activation probability : 0.01
   * reproduct=
ion ratio : 0.8

A bias to the scale-free networks is good if they are good=
 solutions,
but in the general case (no idea about the solution), I don't l=
ike
that much...

...> wrote:
>

ld be

ee networks?

> ken

urrent neural networks.

work topologies. As
